descriptionHTML:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
!! Install first on your phone Watchmaker Premium: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY !!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Watch face features:
BandRKnight
--------------------

- Time/Date
- Dim mode
- Animation
- Weather
- Steps
- Heart rate
- Phone and watch battery indicator
- UTC (soon on next update)
- Multiple colors





Supports and compatible with only the following Android Wear smartwatches:



• Huawei Watch
• LG Watch Urbane
• LG G Watch R
• TAG Heuer Connected
• Fossil Q Founder
• Moto 360 2nd gen
• Nixon mission
• New Balance RunIQ

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Install first on your phone Watchmaker Premium: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Attention! This watch face is protected and is not intended for self-editing. Buying this watch face, you agree to the condition.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation Steps
--------------------------
1. Install on your phone Watchmaker Premium: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY !!!
3. Download the watch face from Google Play and Install it to your phone
4. This watch face will appear automatically on the tab "MY WATCHES" of Watchmaker Premium program
6. Set the watch face on your watch, by clicking on the green button "SET WATCH FACE"
7. Ready to go!



•tap at left dial to change color
•tap right dial to change option screen
•tap 3 to change dim mode

Enjoy!
comments: Awesome watch face! Just an all-around great looking and working watch face!
Great - would like the ability to apply tap actions,etc.
